effect.sun_moon: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.
effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves, selected at random. hidden power and weather ball are treated as normal. Only moves with a different type are eligible, and curse is never eligible. If the user has no suitable moves, this move will fail.

short_effect.sun_moon: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.
short_effect.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: User’s type changes to the type of one of its moves at random.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user changes its type to become the same type as the move at the top of the list of moves it knows.
